ewu.embroidit.parkc.io.XML

Class XMLStitchAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • ewu.embroidit.parkc.io.XML.XMLStitchAdapter

  • public class XMLStitchAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
    Builds an XML binding that stores all necessary stitch information for writing a patterns stitch list to XML.
